REGEXPS = [ /^no such file to load -- (.+)$/i, /^Missing \w+ (?:file\s*)?([^\s]+.rb)$/i, /^Missing API definition file in (.+)$/i, /^cannot load such file -- (.+)$/i, ]

 9:   def path
10:     @path ||= begin
11:       REGEXPS.find do |regex|
12:         message =~ regex
13:       end
